page.title: 12A Day in the Life...a Mum
page.content: My normal working day starts at eight o'clock in the morning when I get up.I get dressed,find the children's clothes for school then make the beds. By the time I get downstairs the children have started their breakfast of cereal,so I put the kettle on for a cup of tea.The children get dressed, have a wash and clean their teeth.I don't usually sit and drink my tea. Instead I generally tidy up and wash the breakfast pots while I'm drinking it. At a quarter to nine Andrew and Paul set off for school and I get myself ready for work.I am a cleaner at the Social Club at the end of the road and I arrive in time to start work at nine o'clock. At work I have to clean the tables, vacuum the carpets,mop the floor,dust around and clean the toilets.I also
